Welcome To PalletHub

Pallet Hub is an interior designing,lighting and furniture manufacturing business located in Mombasa along Bamburi Mtambo. Pallet Hub was founded in 2021 by two enthustiastic partners, Brunnol Mugala and Angeline Mwadime.

We offer a wide range of products and services to our clients. Our main aim is to transform Pallets and furniture into beautiful products.

Phone: 0711206935 | Email: PalletHub@gmail.com | Location: Bamburi Mtambo, Mombasa
